name: Play It Again: An Improv Point & Click Adventure
name_original: Play It Again: An Improv Point & Click Adventure
description:
This game was created by recruiting as many actors as possible to improvise variations on the same four characters and then using randomization to mix and match those performances; ensuring no player ever gets quite the same story.
No specific dialogue was written down for these intrepid improvonauts, only vague instructions on what each line should include (PROMPTS.htm in the main folder is the exact document they were sent).

Extra huge gigantic thanks to everyone who contributed their talents; this whole thing is you and you did great. So be proud! :)

Cast:
William Miracle V (Bluke4x4)
Dave Seamam (CaptainD)
Claudie
Ed Atlin
Natalie Vincent (Eilavamp)
HanaIndiana
Alex Scobell (Kralex)
Oraxon
Ollie Wells
Rob Turner

Made for the March 2014 MAGS contest at the Adventure Game Studio forums. The theme was 'moustaches'
